posts.post_content:
Hi All. 

I am looking for the SweetCap 350/25 back. 

I have all the rest except for the ultra rare backs. 

If you have a SweetCap 350/25, I would like to buy it from you. 

Thanks.
big thanks to Luke and Frank for the assists so far. Really want to get my hands on the Cycle, Old Mill and EPDG soon if I can

Cycle has been acquired!

Now looking for these:

Sweet Cap 350 Fac 25
EPDG
Old Mill
Polar Bear
Sovereign 350

I've switched my focus and would like to get these raw, if possible. If graded is the only option, anything up to a PSA 3ish is fine. But my preference is raw for now. 

Thanks!
